text: Mary Brunner is a former member of the Manson Family cult who was led by criminal, and cult leader Charles Manson. She was born in Eau Claire, Wisconsin. She went to the University of Wisconsinâ€“Madison. She was present during the 1969 murder of Gary Hinman. She was held at the California Institution for Women before she was paroled in 1977. Category:American criminals
title: Mary Brunner
